an RTX 2080 Ti desktop GPU when operating on batches of 
8 crops at stride 32 (Tab. 6). Varying the heatmap resolution 
using dense prediction provides diminishing returns in 
accuracy (Tab. 6), showing that soft-argmax can cope with 
heatmaps of very coarse resolution. By gathering all person 
instances of a frame in a batch, MeTRAbs can process 128, 
118, 98, 67, 41 frames per second for 1, 2, 4, 8 and 16 people
